notes: Secure Boot may need to be disabled in the BIOS settings in the event of a signing error.

installer.script: Invoke-ExternalCommand PnPUtil -ArgumentList @('/add-driver', "$dir\btrfs.inf", '/install') -RunAs -ContinueExitCodes @{ 3010 = 'A system reboot is required to finalize the installation.' } | Out-Null

uninstaller.script: Invoke-ExternalCommand PnPUtil -ArgumentList @('/delete-driver', "$dir\btrfs.inf", '/uninstall') -RunAs -ContinueExitCodes @{ 3010 = 'A system reboot is required to finalize the uninstallation.' } | Out-Null
